Item name Crew Restores 5 health points Repairman Restores 15 health points Ammo simple Gain 10 simple cannonballs Ammo aimed Gain 5 auto aimed cannonballs Ammo double Gain 5 double fire cannonballs Ammo sweep Gain 2 screen sweep cannonballs Nest Increases the effective range by 1.15 Materials Increases the max health in 10 units Map Piece 1/6 th section of a map Map Shows the closest treasure Black Powder Increases the firepower by 0.5 Valuable It grants you 100 gold coins \n (Select item help to display its description)\n (Select item to purchase it)

Arrr Mate!! Welcome to PIRATE SEAS!!\nYarr want to rule these seas and loot all the booty. Choose wisely your next step mate! Lot\'s of good ol\'men have sunk in these waters. When moving to a new zone, you can find an island or more water. If you find a cloudy day.. Beware! An enemy might be lurking behind it. Shake your mobile device to wipe out the clouds! Touch the screen to shoot your selected ammo. You can also shoot using voice commands, such as \'%1$s\' and \'%2$s\' touching the mic icon to make your men listen. Cycle through your ammo types touching the selected ammo icon. (Default setting) Collect booty by sinking your enemies or discovering treasures using the maps you will find on the islands in your path. Red ships are the slowest and the sturdiest. \nYellow ships have normal speed and health. \nGreen ships are the fastest and lightest. Gain exp when sink your enemies and unlock better upgrades Become the greatest pirate king! or walk the plank!
Game Over\nYou when to sleep with Davi Jones (Touch anywhere to go back to the main menu) Score Days passed About us… This is some tutorial content Which direction go next, capt\'n? Select the next direction you want to go Capt\'n! We\'ve been already there! Capt\'n! Land in sight! Capt\'n! There\s nothing here! Which direction we go next? Capt\'n! We can\'t go that way! Map completed! Shake your device %1$d more time(s)! Exit You found %1$d gold coins and gained %2$d xp and a map piece All islands have been discovered. We\'ll sell this map for 90 gold coins!

%1$d Preferences successfully restored Error while restoring preferences Revealed tile is… Enemy defeated Continue Dummy text Event Sensor List Your device has a %1$s sensor. The event %2$s will be triggered. No %1$s sensor detected on your device. The event %2$s will be disabled. During the battles the Day/Night cycle will make the enemy harder to see, so the player will have to improve his/her accuracy. When playing on dark places, the game screen will get darker too. So go find some light! To be able to spawn the enemy ship, the player will have to shake its device a couple of times. Shake it hard! When the sensor control mode is set, the player should not shake its device too hard, or else a whirlpool will appear due to the device shaking and damage both ships. There is no event related to this sensor. Back Back
Shake your device Back to main menu
